content: the starlet beanie is a soft double-layered beanie that is folded inside itself for extra warmth **size information ** sizes 1 2 size fitting sizes 1 2 are equivalent for a head circumference of 54-56 57-60 cm 21¼ 22 22½ 23½ inches the hat has approximately 9 cm 3½ inches of negative ease as alpaca yarn tends to stretch slightly with wear choosing the size measure your head circumference at the widest part of your head above the ears if your head measures for example 55 cm 21¾ inches the corresponding size is 1 if your head measurement falls between two sizes such as 56 5 cm 22¼ inches i recommend rounding up to size 2 **details ** yarn 100 120 g wool me once bumblebee suri dk 100 g / 225 m 246 yds needles 5 mm us 8 / 60 cm 24 inches circular needles and 5 mm us 8 dpns the suggested needle size is indicative and you should choose the needle size based on your knitting gauge to achieve the correct gauge other supplies crochet hook around 6 mm us j-10 stitch markers measuring tape scissors tapestry needle and a piece of leftover yarn such as wool or cotton gauge 13 sts x 22 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches in stockinette stitch knitted with 5 mm needles the swatch should be gently blocked
